subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Only one of the eight players listed as defenders on the United States’ roster has experience in a World Cup, where the team will face several potent offenses.
snippet: Only one of the eight players listed as defenders on the United States’ roster has experience in a World Cup, where the team will face several potent offenses.
